content.title: Small-Batch Production & Testing Video Update
content.creator:
Black Warrior
February 24, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We are excited to share some progress on our Black Warrior projector! We are currently in the process of small-batch production and rigorous testing to ensure that every unit meets our high-quality standards.
To give you an inside look at the journey, we’ve prepared some videos that showcase the process:

We hope you’ll take the time to watch those videos to gain a deeper understanding of the work behind our Black Warrior projector. We’re committed to delivering a product that meets your expectations.
Thank you for being a part of this journey with us and stay tuned for more updates!
Best regards,
Black Warrior Team

comments.text: What are you expecting the sound level to be for the on-board fan?

content.title: 🎉Help Us Unlock Our Stretch Goals!
content.creator:
Black Warrior
February 21, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We are thrilled to announce that, thanks to your incredible support, we have reached over $120,000! Your enthusiasm and backing mean the world to us!
Help Us Unlock Our Stretch Goal:
Today, we want to share some exciting news with all of you:
When our campaign hits $200,000: Unlock 3D Glasses (2 pcs) for all backers!
When our campaign hits $300,000: Unlock the Desktop Stand, which will be available for all backers!
A Quick Tip for Backers: If you’ve already added these items as add-ons, don’t worry! Once the stretch goals are met, we will automatically apply the unlocks to your pledge. And, we’ll refund the amount you’ve paid for these add-ons after our campaign ends. No further action is required from you.
Please help us reach these goals by sharing our campaign with friends and family. Together, we can unlock those bonuses for everyone!
Join Kickbooster today using the link below to grab your exclusive referral link. Earn a 10% cash reward for every successful order you refer. Explore the detailed rules through the link below:
https://black-warrior-cinematic-4k-rgb-3d-gtv.kickbooster.me/boost/black-warrior-cinematic-4k-rgb

Thank you again for your amazing support and stay tuned for more updates!

Best regards,
Black Warrior Team

----------------------------------Projects We Love--------------------------------------------
ZoomYao Max:Compact Yet Powerful 2-in-1 Air Blaster & Vacuum
🌟 Compact Design: Lightweight and compact, easy to carry and store, making it perfect for various environments such as home, office desks, or cars.
💪 Powerful Performance: Combines air blasting and vacuum functions, providing an efficient cleaning experience.
🔄 2-in-1 Functionality: One product that meets both air blasting and vacuuming needs, saving time and effort.
🌍 Versatile Use: Easily handles dust on desktops, between keyboard keys, or debris inside your car.
🖱️  Easy to Use: Simple operation, allowing users to start quickly without complex settings.
⚡ Energy Efficient: The powerful vacuuming and air blasting functions work together to improve cleaning efficiency while saving energy.
DAREU A70: A Sleek One-Piece Aluminum QMK Magnetic Keyboard
🏅One-Piece Aluminum Design: Durable and sleek, enhancing the overall feel.
⚙️QMK Firmware: Highly customizable to suit personal preferences.
🔧Magnetic Assembly: Simplifies assembly and disassembly for easy maintenance.
⌨️Convenient Key Mapping: Custom layouts and shortcuts for programmers, gamers, and creators.
💪Unique Design: Comfortable to use, combining style and performance.
✨Ultra-Slim Design: Comfortable for long use, reducing wrist fatigue.
